title: Gut reno 3BR/2BA W/washer & dryer in the unit, private deck and parkin
posting_body: ['ID #1837', '- Pre-war building', '- 1st floor unit', '- Live-in Super', '- extra storage unit for tenant', '- Washer & Dryer in unit!', '- Private outdoor space', '- Private parking spot', '- Amazing natural light', '- Newly Renovated 3BR Apartment', '- Full-twin size bedrooms', '- Great layout', '- LARGE gut reno open Kitchen', '- Brand New Stainless Steel appliances', '- Sparkling refinished Hardwood floors', '- Two full brand new Modern tiled Bathrooms', '- GREAT closet space', '- High Ceilings', '- Over sized Windows, Drenched in Sunlight!', '- Rich original details & moldings', '- Clean, Sleek finishes!', '- Perfect Location!', '- Close to B/Q Trains @', 'Prospect Park Minutes to NYC!!', '- Nearby much shopping, bars/nightlife, convenience & more!', '- HEAT & HOT WATER INCLUDED', '- Pets OK Upon!', 'Lease Terms', '* 1st month rent + security deposit + brokerage  fee to move in', '* CREDIT CHECK & INCOME VERIFICATION REQUIRED!', '* APPLICANTS: Must Earn 36-40X the rent and have decent credit.', '* GUARANTORS: must earn 70-80X rent.', 'In & out-of-state Guarantors.', '*', 'This unit is available ASAP- Serious candidates ONLY to view.']
